verbs.description: For the Trump administration , the prospect of [V: erasing] [ARG1: a large amount of the U.S. trade deficit with China] [ARGM-ADV: while also supporting a thriving domestic industry] could prove a tempting deal .

For the Trump administration , the prospect of erasing a large amount of the U.S. trade deficit with China while [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: supporting] [ARG1: a thriving domestic industry] could prove a tempting deal .
For the Trump administration , the prospect of erasing a large amount of the U.S. trade deficit with China while also supporting a thriving domestic industry [V: could] prove a tempting deal .

[ARGM-ADV: For the Trump administration] , the prospect of erasing a large amount of the U.S. trade deficit with China while also supporting a thriving domestic industry [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: prove] [ARG1: a tempting deal] .
